text:
Six persons were injured in a clash that broke out between two groups at Puthur in Woraiyur area here on Tuesday night. Police said a group of people came out in a procession from Puthur Mandhai area with a flex banner of goddess Kuzhumayee Amman to install it in connection with the Kuzhumayee Amman temple festival on Thursday. As they came to the Puthur area, another group from Kalnayakan street came to that spot where a wordy quarrel erupted between them.

Things soon took a turn for the worse leading to a clash between the two groups in which stones were pelted on the banner causing tension. An auto was damaged in the stone pelting. Six persons who were injured in the clash were admitted to the Government Hospital here. The Woraiyur police booked a case against more than eight persons under various IPC sections including 307 (attempt to murder). The sources said five of the accused were arrested on Wednesday.
title: Six injured in group clash
